short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension adds volume percentages, improves slider responsiveness & makes youtube music feel better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your YouTube Music experience with YouTube Music Manager!

This extension adds a volume percentage display for accurate control and significantly improves slider responsiveness⚡for a smoother experience.

The standout feature is Auto-Pause Manager, which automatically pauses music when videos or other media start playing and resumes playback as soon as they stop.

No more manual interruptions – focus on what matters while YouTube Music adapts to your multitasking needs.💡🔍
🎉 Perfect for users who want enhanced control and seamless integration with their media activities!
